decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 167cavendlshavenue/2023/05 PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN, 167cavendlshavenue/2023/06 Rev A PROPOSED LOFT PLAN, 167cavendlshavenue/2023/07 Rev A PROPOSED R00F PLAN, 167cavendlshavenue/2023/08 Rev A PROPOSED ELEVATIONS and 167cavendlshavenue/2023/09 Rev B PROPOSED OUTBUILDING PLAN/ELEVATIONS
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall complement the appearance of those of the existing property and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2019 - Section 12, policies D2 and D6 of the London Plan 2021; 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013) and policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18).

| The outbuilding shall only be used for domestic purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwelling and not for any separate residential, industrial, commercial or business use. No kitchen or cooking facilities shall be installed at any time.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012), policies D1, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and policy DAA of Ealings' Local Plan (Reg.18).
description: Rear and side dormer windows, installation of two rooflights to front roof slope; single storey rear outbuilding ancillary to first floor maisonette
subdivision_of_building: Loft Level and Rear of Garden
